website_summaries.verdict: Intended for beginner to intermediate gymnasts, this fiberglass and synthetic wood bar has a weight limit of 130 lbs.
pros: Made of powder polyester painted steel base and stainless steel regulating arm
35mm fiberglass bar covered with non-slip synthetic wood material
Adjusts from 36 to 59 inches with adjustable screw knobs
cons: Varnished, synthetic wood bar is a bit slippery

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My kids have loved having this bar in the house. They will flip on this over and over again, which is nice for me since they exert some of their energy. I feel like it's sturdy when the bar is both low and high. I've had 4 young kids on it at once (I know it's probably not meant for that) but it has still held up and I have never felt like the kids are unsafe. The bar stays locked in place when I adjust the height too!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great starter bar for young gymnasts!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and it was very easy to put together! Took me about 1/2 hr. It’s very sturdy! My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: veachrst

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bar!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bar for my (new) 7 year old. She is on a level 2, gymnastics team. This bar is very sturdy and provides excellent practices her her at home. We keep it in our 2nd living area, as it is not overly sized. I would highly recommend this for your little gymnast.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my girl
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bar for my girl's birthday and she absolutely LOVES it.The gymnastics bar came to us without problem, was easy to install. We’ve had it for days now,usually we put it in our garage,and everything still seems extremely well made.Excellent quality and overall a great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: DavidWaller

customer_reviews.title: nice heavy bar
customer_reviews.text: nice heavy bar, it is steel with some wood looking coating on it. Works for 2 6 year olds and 9year old girls.
customer_reviews.author: Cogen Guru

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My child is in gymnastics. Uses this to practice at home. Works great. Highly recommend. Weight of child 77lbs.
customer_reviews.author: AZ home

customer_reviews.title: Santa is mad about the cardboard box!
customer_reviews.text: Santa be warned: PICTURE OF THE ITEM IS PRINTED OUT OUTSIDE OF CARDBOARD BOX. Package too heavy to grab quickly and stash inside before curious kids see it. Gymmatsdirect, around xmas time, could you black out the name and picture of item on cardboard box with a marker so kids don't figure out what Santa is bringing? Otherwise, happy that you ship that massive heavy thing without charging us an arm and a leg! Will update review after xmas, but after spending hours reading reviews and checking various websites, this item seemed to be the best deal/option for a kid level 4 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Logic

customer_reviews.title: Came Defective, Customer Service Handled immediately
customer_reviews.text: The bar appears to be nice quality, but unfortunately it came with a base that is bent and will not hold a screw. The pieces aren't all the same as they should be, and it's not lining up for "easy assembly." However, I contacted the seller who immediately responded and is shipping a new part, as well as a partial refund. We are very pleased with the customer service aspect, willing to go above and beyond to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon and Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size and material, not a true gymnastics bar.
customer_reviews.text: Not a true gymnastics bar. The material is different, there is no give on the bar, so hip circles and other movements will cause bruising. The diameter of the bar is much smaller than a gymnastics bar. Recommend not buying if you are using it for actual gymnastics practice. It is durable and stable.
customer_reviews.author: mcmeegan

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is loving it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 7 year old daughter to practice gymnastics at home. The package arrived and it was boxed well to protect the bars. This kip bar is heavy duty, super stable, and all around amazing No wiggling or wobbling when my daughter is flipping on it! Bar is super smooth, too. The best decision I made was to order this bar!! You absolutely will not regret buying this bar!! I can't say enough good things about it!
customer_reviews.author: Triunfador125

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 7 and 9 year old daughters who are in gymnastics. I use it with the 8' foam gymnastics mat that fits "inside" the bar and it makes for a fantastic way to safely practice and play. Very sturdy. When they have friends come over I'll walk in and see 3 girls all flipping and playing on the bar at one time and it can handle it. Assembly is not difficult with the proper wrenches but realize these are heavy metal pieces (which is what you want) so just expect that.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H Williams

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly well made for the money
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well made, easy to assemble. Contains all the tools required for set up. We were able to set it up within 10 mins. Takes down quickly for easy storage. My 5 yr old daughter loves it even my 1 yr old was hanging from the bar. Lovely pink color. I didn't buy the mat with it but I'm sure I'm going to need it for safety. Height adjust from very low to very high. Platform seems very stable. It should work well for kids of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Best Gymnastics Bar ever
customer_reviews.text: So my daughter & I purchased this for her daughter (my grand daughter) who will turn 6 soon and this is the nicest, sturdiest gymnastic bar ever. She loves it and is consistently on it. It will not tip over and its very secure when you raise or lower the bar because you have to unscrew to pull out the pins and then screw them back together, which she can not do....lol, at least right now!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ness

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice home gymnastics bar and a great price. It's very sturdy. My 8 yr old is on it all the time. She practices her pullover, casting, back hip circles, and all the basic bar moves. She has really improved and gained confidence using this. It was not easy to put together. The instructions could have been way better. They were too small to read and see which way the bolts go. But we figured it out and very happy with the purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A.

customer_reviews.title: Good but Moves
customer_reviews.text: Great bar for the price. My only complaint is that it rocks and slides when my daughter is on it. She only weighs 50 lbs so she’s only half the max weight. We have put stuff under it and on top To hold it but nothing has worked so far. Overall a good bar though but I would rather pay a bit more money if there’s a bar out there that stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey B. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great Flip Bar
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 year old daughter who is very athletic. She has a lot of upper body strength and loves this flip bar. We literally use it every day. I set it up without my husbands help and it was easy and it is sturdy. We love the pink color and it seems like the same quality you would find at the gymnastics classes we have taken.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Goetsch

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner bar
customer_reviews.text: The bar is great for the price. I have 6 & 8 year old girls who love it daily. I wish there was more weight to it or an extra cross beam on the floor because they have caused it to “jump”/twist when they flip. this isn’t a huge problem and it happens rarely. But I still wish it didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Penny

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This kip bar is built well and works great. The kit came with 2 wrenches that made it easy to assemble, it took only about 10-15 minutes to complete the assembly. Very sturdy and worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: JillyN

customer_reviews.title: Easy and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been a success. Even my 170lb 15 year old son has enjoyed it. Right now we have it in my basement on a lower setting for my 10year old son and he plays every single day! Practices his gymnastics stuff and some star wars make believe too.
customer_reviews.author: busybeemom

customer_reviews.title: Bar Review
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a Christmas present for my daughter and there hasn’t been a day where she hasn’t used it! The bar is sturdy and constructed well. We have the mat underneath but no extra support bars or weights on it. (My daughter is 65 lbs). Only reason I gave 4 starts is because the holes for the bolts were very tough to get lined up.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly MV

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter when she turned 8- over a year later she still loves it and uses it regularly. Very durable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: threelittlemonkeys

customer_reviews.title: Did not include manual
customer_reviews.text: You are automatically going to get less than 3 stars if you forget to put in an assembly instruction manual. That's pretty basic. Overall, materials seem solid and sturdy. Good buy except for their misstep with the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Lescoot

customer_reviews.title: My girls loved it !
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 9 yo and 7 yo , they live it ! Very sturdy and strong , they even sometimes go on it together . Note that there is a metal connoting the bars on the ground just parallel to the bar- you must get the mattress as well cause it is not safe without it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie G.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My daughter is 7 and it doesn't move on her. She loves it and plays on it daily
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best birthday present
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited when she received this for her birthday. I had a question on the screws that were included, and the manufacturer got back to me within hours! Excellent customer service and even though it’s only been a couple of days, the bar seems to be excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, good quality. Has been getting a lot of use and seems to be holding up just fine. Doesnt threaten to tip over with 65lb 10 year old flipping around on it. It meets but doesn't exceed expectations given the price.
customer_reviews.author: K919

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality piece of equipment. It is very well constructed and made from heavy duty materials. At first i thought it came without assembly instructions, but found that they were stuck underneath the packing material. Regardless, it is very easy to assemble and fairly self-explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Noland

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bar for our 9 year old beginner gymnast and she loves it! The light blue bar looks just as pictured. The bar is very sturdy and assembly was fairly easy. I'd buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: S Goode

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy fun for my eight year old
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my daughter playing on this. She is having so much fun. I helped her in between her gymnastics lessons she is 8 years old and has just been in gymnastics a year. Purchase was months ago it seems very sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mello

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Bar..... it’s “ok”
customer_reviews.text: This product was on the difficult side to set up. Husband is a contractor and it took some time. The height of the bar is never fully locked into place, as you tighten it to secure the height you want it doesn’t go into any holes or anything and the bright ends up sliding down on one side or the other. I wish we would of chose a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good product I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, pretty decent paint job, very tough for small hands to adjust height but that may not be a bad thing. Bar is solid without splinters. A few rooky fabricator errors: bb's, warping, a little rough beads. A good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very sturdy! This is fantastic and she loves using the bar. Great for practice!
customer_reviews.author: Jade H.

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy and well used
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy kip bar. I have a 7 and 9 yesr old thst play on it every day. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RoseValley Dreaming

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions, screws all different sizes & too short
customer_reviews.text: Directions are TERRIBLE. Our screws are all different lengths, only 4 out of the 20 are actually long enough. Need all new screws.
customer_reviews.author: DrXtina

customer_reviews.title: Great product for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together. No real instructions on how all of the washers go on though so I tried my best. I was missing one cap nut but customer service sent me a replacement quickly. Kids love it. I can even twirl around the bar at 200+ lbs. and feel safe on it!
customer_reviews.author: math_man_bill

customer_reviews.title: It does flips over the competition....
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for our little gymnast. She absolutely loves it. It’s surprisingly sturdy and was simple to put it together. Very solid all the way around. She swung on it all Christmas Day. Poor kid got blisters the next day 🤦‍♂️. I’d recommend getting some hand grips with it though.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Perfect for my 7 year old. Well made and very durable
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: My gymnast loved it but time I got it drivers the box ...
customer_reviews.text: My gymnast loved it but time I got it drivers the box and it was bent on one side of the legs I have to drill some holes just get the bolts on just get tight
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Cusick

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for Christmas. Looked at many before I bought one. This was is great! Easy to adjust the height and is very sturdy! My daughter loves it and can see it lasting a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: rrtt

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, keeps kids active
customer_reviews.text: “Santa” dropped this off and my 6 and 8 year olds haven’t been off of it. It’s the first thing they do in the morning and last before bed. Quality is great. Ive hung 160lb on it and it didn’t budge. Ok I’m lying I’m like 175lb but you get the point.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: The gymnast(s) in your family will love this.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, and feels sturdy. Product quality is great. I can’t keep my daughter off of it. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, strong and hard to move
customer_reviews.text: Santa came up big again! My daughters love this bar. Sturdy and strong. Easy enough to put together, but assemble in the room you are going to use it, otherwise you’ll have working moving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy ! Bought it for my granddaughter and she loved it! Well worth the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy! Very well built and my 10yo daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Falisha

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This bar is very sturdy and has really helped our daughter progress in gymnastics! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris michalsen

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for your little flipper
customer_reviews.text: We've had it up for three weeks and its had been a lot of fun for the kiddo. Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mays

customer_reviews.title: Gymnastics bar
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. The kids love it. Super sturdy. Extends y’all enough for my hubby to play on it too! Defiantly need a mat to under to protect from the bars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love this bar! It is sturdy and made of high quality materials. My daughter is able to do her kips, front and back hip circles and much more on this bar!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My husband assembled this gymnastics bar on Christmas Eve, and I am happy to report that the assembly was not stressful. The bar is sturdy, which makes me feel comfortable with our children using it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Lea

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this! She does pull overs and back hip circles on it every day. Very well made!
customer_reviews.author: A....

customer_reviews.title: Good training bar
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My daughter can do her squat on practice as well as kips and back hip circles. No issues. Sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Stein

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this! My 6 and 4 year old enjoy flipping around on this and we love that they can be active even in rainy weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lemenager

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality for a reasonable price! My kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Gimondo

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves her new gymnastics bar. It was super easy to assemble and very sturdy! Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The holes are uneven on each side so each time I want to lower or raise the bar I have to get my wrench to unscrew the wood from the frame and lower each side by its own. If I let the bar go it's about 3 feet off from the other side of the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Salo

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy bar. Grows with the child.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like how it came in two separate packages. Thought I was missing a piece and worried that my daughter would see her Christmas gift at the door. Very pleased with the quality of the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great bar for practicing!
customer_reviews.text: I have two girls that love gymnastics, so for Christmas Santa brought this to our house! They can’t stay off of it. It’s very sturdy and we haven’t had any issues. Great product. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tochia

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 year old was so excited to finally get her gymnastics bar. It came with the wrong bolts and wrong hardware. It is missing the center floor crossbar. Update : Seller sent the missing parts and made it right!! Thank you for fixing the problem. Can's ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: No Assembly Instructions
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and appears sturdy....no assembly instructions whatsoever and a bag of hardware that could probably be figured out but with kids on this, why would you leave that to chance??
customer_reviews.author: tamara

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Cute
customer_reviews.text: This gymnastics bar has been a hit ever since we purchased it. Not only was it easy to assemble, but the sturdiness of the product is super durable. I would highly recommend this bar and mat to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: olivia bartosh

customer_reviews.title: Great bar for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! The bar does not move or tip when my 8 year old is doing flips on it. Easy to assemble and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Good product good value
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well made this was. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, holds a lot of weight. My daughter absolutely loves her bar set, she’s 8 years old 50 pounds and it doesn’t rock or move one bit. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rosencrans

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is just what my daughter wanted to practice her gym bar flips! She absolutely loves it! It’s very sturdy.. shipping was fast also.. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughters got the bar for Christmas and love it! They are downstairs practicing on the bar every day. They are so excited to because they are improving.
customer_reviews.author: Angela P

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and will grow with my young gymnast! She loves this and is so excited to use it daily! Great product, very easy and quick setup!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a solid beam! It was amazing Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Spring

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great price!
customer_reviews.text: We searched high and low for a cheaper bar that was also very sturdy with a higher weight limit! We found this one! Very sturdy bar and Is well worth the money! So impressed especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G. Herring

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 11 yr old daughter and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hobgood

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built gymnastics bar. It’s definitely sized for smaller kids, but will handle the weight of an adult no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alex F.

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece - they sent after complaint - product is fine
customer_reviews.text: The bar is fine - it's fairly sturdy and was not terribly difficult to put together. It arrived missing a MAJOR piece, and after some back and forth, the company sent me the piece.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sargen

customer_reviews.title: No assembly manual
customer_reviews.text: Came with no instructions. Really annoying trying to assemble Christmas Eve. Not awesome for a company to shop with no instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves this! Relatively easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: K. Steele

customer_reviews.title: MOM APPROVED, KID APPROVED.
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love it! They use it daily and have been having so much fun. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: Nice but....
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Takes up a lot of space but that was expected. Just wished it would fold up or come apart easier.
customer_reviews.author: Toni F. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Went together quick and easy.  Very sturdy for a 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Went together quick and easy. Very sturdy for a 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Helland

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy product, easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: “Santa” got this for our kids for Christmas and they love it! Assembly was easy. Holding up well! My wife even did a flip on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Leach

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sturdy for my 7 yr old it’s good solid metal and heavy enough to hold her it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. They have swung and hung and twirled for 6 months and it's still like the day we put it together.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my 6 yr old granddaughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product! Just what we wanted for our seven year old to practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bar. On it every day since Santa brought it.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Happy Daughter
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the fast handling of this order. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 5 year old daughter. Customer service was great
customer_reviews.author: Lanie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: For the most part my daughter can practice her bar ...
customer_reviews.text: For the most part my daughter can practice her bar skills, but when it comes to doing her full routines, it is difficult. The bar is wooden and is varnished so it is slippery. It does not have the flexibility as the bars in the gym. Also the base is a little wobbly so that makes it difficult to do her full routine. I put weights on the base and that does help. I am going to try to get gym chalk to see if that helps with the grip. Not what I expected but still worth the money of she can practice her skills.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cassady

customer_reviews.title: Good But Had Some Problems
customer_reviews.text: Weak packaging, the thing showed up like a beach ball. Overall it's been holding up fine and is a good value. I didn't enjoy putting it together as the holes didn't line up very well. I put tape around the bar ends before putting them into the uprights to tighten the joint, otherwise it would have been an excessively loose fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Good Clean Fun

customer_reviews.title: Not Stable
customer_reviews.text: I chose the economical route for a home kip bar for my 50lb daughter. While i enjoyed fast free shipping and it was easy enough to assemble from one box, it just proved to be way too wobbly for my daughter (who is petite). Spend a little more for a more sturdy bar at home...it'll be worth it! It appears that the main issue is the design where the bar supports connect to two separate base pieces. Keep looking... (FYI I paid $40 more for another one and am very happy with it thus far)
customer_reviews.author: Daddyofanangel

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty and works great, paint was not a big deal
customer_reviews.text: Paint was flaking off parts of the unit, one of the handles was broke but company replaced it. Heavy-duty and works great, paint was not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hess

customer_reviews.title: Seems very sturdy and my girls are loving it
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy and my girls are loving it. The only issue is that paint was chipping off a large segment of it when we opened the package. We sent an email to the company and have yet to hear anything back from them.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K Virkler

product_meta.title: Gymnastics Bar for Kids Adjustable Horizontal Junior Training Kip Bars with Mat Optional Ideal for Gymnasts 1-4 Levels for Home
feature_bullets: UPGRADED DESIGN and UNIQUE MATERIAL - New curved legs base structure design to avoid sides waggle,more sturdy.We upgraded the fiberglass bar, since ordinary wood bar may be deformed or cracked, the fiberglass bar is stronger and more slip resistant.

HEAVY DUTY and STURDY - Our kip bar can hold up to 340LBS and no extension needed.The base of the bar is well-constructed with 2 thickened steel tube and 2 steel tie tube(others brand is 1 piece only).Kids can flip freely on the gym bar.

TRIPLE LOCKING ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT BAR -Triple screw knobs not only make sure kip bar locked safely,but make it easy to adjust height from 37.5"-57.5" (11 ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT).It is perfect for young gymnast as it can be adjusted to their height as they grow.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE - Our gymnastics bar installation takes only five steps. With bolts and the only tool required is a wrench, assembly is easy and quick. Wonderful and surprising gift for children’s birthday,Halloween,Thanksgiving Day,Christmas and so on.

HASSLE-FREE WARRANTY - Gymmatsdirect brand item provides with a 3-Year factory warranty. No Extra Charge for Replacement Part. If your item is damaged during shipping or any part problem within 3 years, please contact Gymmatsdirect directly.
